title: Ticket #1519: spooled input files getting uploaded twice
description:
In condor's file transfer mechanism, the shadow transmits some spooled input files twice to the execute side.

This happened if the file was listed in the transfer_input_files list as a simple basename (no directory part).

The origin of this problem is probably earlier than 7.0.0. I have not done a thorough investigation of the history.
